name: Cerwen's Stand
description:
The game follows the story of the wizard Cerwen and his stand against the forces
of evil that came to destroy his home, the kingdom of Northumbria. Players will assume the role of
Cerwen the wizard as he defends the
castle of Northumbria from the army of orc’s and demons.

Controls:

↑ - Move Up

↓ - Move Down

Space bar - Cast Spell

Gameplay :

• The players must maneuver between three positions and destroy the invading forces with Cerwens magic.

• The players must destroy the enemies before they reach the castle, if the castle is overrun the game is over.

• The players gain points for the amount of time they can hold out against the unending hoard.
